parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description:
The instance IDs of the cloud services that you want to query. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

> If you do not specify this parameter, an empty list is returned.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
